summary: Boston University (BU) is a private university in Boston, Massachusetts, founded in 1839 by Boston Methodists. It has three campuses and offers many degrees, including bachelor's, master's, and doctorates. BU is known for its research and has a lot of famous alumni, like Nobel and Pulitzer Prize winners. Its sports teams, the Terriers, compete in NCAA Division I. The university's mascot is Rhett the Boston Terrier. In 1876, a BU professor invented the telephone.
title: Boston University
